alert.note: Alert for Mono (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 08 at 10:34AM PDT until further notice by NWS Reno
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in California...Nevada... West Walker River Near Little Walker and Coleville affecting Mono County. Walker River near PT Site below Weber Reservoir near Schurz affecting Mineral County. East Walker River Above Strosnider Ditch Near Mason affecting Lyon County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Warm temperatures will continue to melt snowpack and produce high river flows. * WHERE...West Walker River Near Little Walker and Coleville. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 5.5 feet, Monitor Stage, No flooding in reach from West Walker River Canyon through Antelope Valley CA including Walker, Coleville, Topaz CA. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM PDT Saturday the stage was 5.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate below flood stage with a maximum value of 5.5 feet just after midnight tonight. - Action stage is 5.5 feet. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when hiking or camping near riverbanks. If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.cnrfc.noaa.gov The next statement will be issued Sunday.
